Qieyun: 徹三尤去?, 曉三東入?

English: to seize; to catch; to arrest
to set up; to establish if; supposing
a hole; a pitfall; a snare

Qieyun: 心開三之平?, 心開三之去?
English: to wait upon; to spy; to way-lay
a book; to write; written characters
a village; country; one's native place

Qieyun: 見合一歌平?, 見合一歌去?
English: to pass; to go by, past; to commit a fault

Qieyun: 清三東入?, 精三東入?

English: to fall down; to slide; to sink

Qieyun: 書開三陽平?, 書開三陽去?
精三虞去?, 精三鍾入?
English: the foot; the leg; enough; sufficient
to expell the breath; to call out to
to beg; to entreat; to aim at

Qieyun: 云合三元平?, 云合三仙去?
English: to lay hold of; to cling to; to pull out; to assist; to rescue
to finish; since; when; a particle of completed action

Qieyun: 昌合三脂去?, 昌合三眞入?
English: to go out; to drag out; to produce

Qieyun: 透開一寒平?, 透開一寒去?
疑一模平?, 疑開二麻平?

English: if; to be of little importance
to go at; to reach the end; utmost; best
